Class RowMapperBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object

Type Parameters:
T - type of the mapper result.
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class RowMapperBuilder<T>
extends Object
implements PartialRowMapper<T>
A builder to build a RowMapper.
